channel.title: Ok does 64 bit windows 7 computer run good with private servers?
channel.description: could me having a windows 7 computer 64 bit computer bet he reason that i have everything fixed, but that i cant open my source and it automatically closes? please help.

item.title: Ok does 64 bit windows 7 computer run good with private servers?
item.dc:creator: @bigbaddrag bigbaddrag
item.description:
@bigbaddrag wrote:

I had the same problem, but after searching youtube, i got the solution.

First, open the client files and find the program that runs the client, right click and edit it.

next find the word “java” and replace it with this(include the “”)

"C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe"

save it and run the client, this has fixed clients for me every time.

also, if you have a different jre version, just change the 6 in the code above to your version of jre

Read full topic
item.source: Ok does 64 bit windows 7 computer run good with private servers?

the thing is that the source was running like a month ago
now, it just automatically closes.

item.source: Ok does 64 bit windows 7 computer run good with private servers?

item.title: Ok does 64 bit windows 7 computer run good with private servers?
item.dc:creator: @triger545 triger545
item.description:
@triger545 wrote:

I have windows 7 and it runs perfectly. You sure you have JDK? If you do edit your compiler and or runserver and make sure your version of JDK is there.
Ex.
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe”

Say you downloaded update 21. change that 10 to 21.

There you go

Read full topic
